<Text: Short Circuit 2 is a 1988 American science fiction comedy film, the sequel to the 1986 film "Short Circuit".>

--------------------
Text: Short Circuit 2:  It was directed by Kenneth Johnson, and starred Fisher Stevens as Ben Jahveri, Michael McKean as Fred Ritter, Cynthia Gibb as Sandy Banatoni, and Tim Blaney as the voice of Johnny 5 (the main character – a friendly, naive, self-aware robot).
Triplets:<Fisher Stevens
2:
Text: Short Circuit 2:  Filming took place in downtown Toronto, Ontario, Canada.
